description:
Second year student of the distinguished Fujisaki Girls Academy Kurahashi Riko is known by fellow students as a wonderfully wild girl and is also known as "the Wild Kid."
One day, Riko witnesses the unladylike behavior of the lovely and academically successful student council president Maki "Miss Fujijo" Natsuo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 出会ってしまった二人
